ai-patthana16.21:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.21:0.3_0: this is the level of the mind.
ai-patthana16.21:1.1_0: Being skilled in the mind, thought, and known by the mind.
ai-patthana16.21:2.1_0: Being unskillful, they don’t arise because of the mind, their mind is not for the five reasons.
ai-patthana16.21:3.1_0: Nose thought arises dependent on the mind, mind, and three is a cause of the mind.
ai-patthana16.21:5.1_0: Taking skillful thoughts, they don’t grasp the skillful, and the level of the mind. ...
ai-patthana16.21:6.1_0: Enjoying mind, they don’t look down on the unskillful. Patience gives rise to the five reasons.
ai-patthana16.21:7.1_0: Not reciting the Monastic Code, they don’t arise: for three reasons.
